Linear Motion: Velocity equals distance divided by time.
Acceleration equals change in velocity over time.
Final velocity equals initial velocity plus acceleration times time.
Displacement equals initial velocity times time plus half acceleration times time squared.
Final velocity squared equals initial velocity squared plus two times acceleration times displacement.
Average velocity equals total displacement divided by total time.
Newton's Laws & Forces: Weight equals mass times gravitational acceleration.
Pressure equals force divided by area.
Fluid pressure equals density times gravity times height.
Work, Energy & Power: Work equals force times displacement times cosine of angle.
Kinetic energy equals half mass times velocity squared.
Potential energy equals mass times gravity times height.
Power equals work divided by time.
Mechanical energy equals kinetic energy plus potential energy.
Simple Machines: Lever principle: force times lever arm equals output force times output arm.
Work equals force times number of pulley rotations.
Oscillations & Waves: Period of spring oscillation equals 2π times square root of mass over spring constant.
Period of pendulum equals 2π times square root of length over gravity.
Wave speed equals wavelength times frequency.
Basic Electricity: Ohm's law: voltage equals current times resistance.
Electric energy equals voltage times current times time.
Electric power equals voltage times current.
Circular Motion: Angular velocity equals angle divided by time.
Linear velocity equals angular velocity times radius.
Centripetal acceleration equals velocity squared over radius.
Centripetal force equals mass times centripetal acceleration.
Gravitation: Gravitational force equals G times product of masses over distance squared.
Gravitational potential equals negative G times mass over radius.
Gravitational potential energy equals negative G times product of masses over distance.
Momentum & Impulse: Impulse equals force times time, equal to change in momentum.
Fluid Mechanics: Fluid pressure equals density times gravity times depth.
Buoyant force equals density times gravity times displaced volume.
Continuity equation: area times velocity is constant.
Bernoulli's equation: total fluid energy remains constant.
Thermodynamics: Heat equals mass times specific heat times temperature change.
Work done equals pressure times volume change.
Change in internal energy equals heat minus work.
Waves, Sound & Light: Wave speed equals wavelength times frequency.
Doppler effect: observed frequency changes with motion of source or observer.
Snell's law: refraction of light between media.
Electricity & Magnetism: Ohm's law: voltage equals current times resistance.
Total resistance in series equals sum of resistances.
Total resistance in parallel equals reciprocal sum.
Magnetic field around a long straight wire.
Lorentz force equals charge times velocity times magnetic field times sine of angle.
Modern Physics: Photoelectric effect: kinetic energy equals photon energy minus work function.
